ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents reps from adjusting the Line items of an opportunity once it has been Billed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( SID_Stage__c , "Installed/Billed")
&&( Opportunity.RecordTypeId = "0120W000001QE0O" || Opportunity.RecordTypeId = "0120W000001lCLQ" || Opportunity.RecordTypeId = "0120W000001lCLV" )
&& $Profile.Name <>"System Admin Jr" && $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <>"Group Business Solutions" && $Profile.Name <>"Jamaica - ICT/GSM Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Bermuda ICT&GSM - Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Barbados ICT - Manager" && $Profile.Name <>"Trinidad ICT&GSM - Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Digicel PNG Sales Operations" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Sales Executive" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Sales Manager" && $Profile.Name <>"DBS Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"DBS Power User - Dealhub Pilot" && $Profile.Name <>"Jamaica - ICT/GSM Power User - Dealhub Pilot" && $Profile.Name <>"FWI DBS Standard User - Dealhub Pilot"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Editing the Line Item when the opportunity is Billed is not allowed. Please contact your Manager for assistance.
